body:
Hi this post is purely to avoid confusion as it has popped up quite a bit in the last few days : BmB is not my main account, Gimpus is.
Gimpus is banned from Avicus because, in the most simple way  i can think of it, kinda given the option to have BmB or Gimpus unbanned those few months ago and i chose BmB because i was better known on that account.  However on kohi and OCN, which  i play considerably more than Avicus that will be my IGN.  

So please mods don't ban me instantly, know that it is all sorted out.

Also who wants to see me combo a kohi pvper? 
I do:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RkqHododog4 
watch the whole thing the ending makes me orgasm. I'm Gimpus and i know i look sketchy as hell in this vid but i have improved recently and his FOV makes it look a whole lot worse.

replies.body:
Hi this post is purely to avoid confusion as it has popped up quite a bit in the last few days : OsamaBinBangin is not my main account, Talibanter is.
Talibanter isnt banned from Avicus because, in the most simple way  i can think of it, im legit and i chosed both because yolo.  However on para-network and OCN, which i play considerably more than Avicus that will be my IGN.  

So please mods don't ban me instantly, know that it is all sorted out. 

Also who wants to see me combo a para-network pvper? 
I do:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uNr5teKXx8o
watch the whole thing the ending makes me orgasm. I'm Talibanter and i know i look sketchy as hell in this vid but i have improved recently and his FOV makes it look a whole lot worse.
